mdx.rawBody:
Song: Thendral varum
Film: pAru pAru pattaNam pAru
Singers : SPB SJ
Music : IR
---
Notes: s r2 g3 m1 p d1 n3 S

thendral varum ennai aNaikkum
p.   s   r rg  g rgm gr   sn.

en vAsal engum poo mazhai
p. s n.  r s   n.srn.n.p.

en vAzhkai endrum vaLar pirai
p. s   n.  r  r   r n.  p.p.m.p.

Stanza 1:
nEtru nAn unnai ninaithEn      ninaithEn idai nAn iLaithEn
g  g  rgm g r   s s  n.rsn.d.  n.s  sr   rr   rgs gm  mp

thOgai nyAbagam enakkum       dhinamum iravil pirakkum
g  g   rgmg r   ss  n.rsn.d.  n. s sr  rrgrgs g m  mp

Adai sumandhu azhagu nadakkum
md   m d  pm  md  m  d d  pm

Asai pirandhu arugil azhaikkum
md   m d  pm  md m   dd   pm

nenjam silirkkum nee thodum nEram
m  md  p m   g   rgm g  r   srsn.d.p,

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
mAda mALigai amaipEn malarAl padukkai viripEn
kooda nAn vara thudipEn kadhavai medhuvAi thirapEn
kAlam kanindhAl kanavu palikkum
kAval kadandhAl nANam thadukkum
pakkam izhukkum vAliba vEgam
